properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 6 at 4:41AM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS
EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT AGENCY EL PASO TX/SANTA TERESA NEW MEXICO.

THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT
NETWORK

THE PETERSBURG POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR NICHOLAS ANDREW
PEREZ, WHO IS A WHITE, MALE. AGE 4 YEARS OLD. HIS HEIGHT IS 4
FEET. HIS WEIGHT IS 45 POUNDS. HE HAS BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND
WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A GREEN SHIRT, BLUE JEANS, AND BLACK AND
WHITE NIKE SHOES.

POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR MARICELA AMADA PAZ, WHO IS A WHITE,
FEMALE. SHE IS 21 YEARS OLD. HER HEIGHT IS 5 FEET 6 INCHES. HER
WEIGHT IS 228 POUNDS. SHE HAS BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES.

THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A WHITE, EARLY 2000S, MITSUBISHI WITH A TEXAS,
UNKNOWN LICENSE PLATE NUMBER.

THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM IN LUBBOCK, TEXAS.

LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR
IMMEDIATE DANGER.

IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE
PETERSBURG POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 0 6 6 6 7 3 8 1 1.
